craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 15 bonus Ability Power and 15% Critical Strike Chance.

Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 10 bonus starting Mana and 10 bouns Ability Power. Abilities cost 10 less Mana to cast.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 10.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 30 bonus Armor. Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal 75/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

[Aura item]

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Grants 30 bonus Magic Resist. Every 2 seconds, regenerate 4% maximum Health.

craf.name: Fimbulwinter
craf.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds and 35 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

​​[Aura item]

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Grant 20% bonus Attack Damage and 20 bonus Ability Power. Abilities and attacks deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become stealthed, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. Then, grant 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 2 effects:
- +15 Attack Damage and +15 Ability Power.
- 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 22% Omnivamp. Damage heals the lowest percent Health ally for the same amount.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 20% bouns Attack Damage and 15% bouns Critical Strike Chance.

Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs:
Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana.

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: Grant 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 10% bonus Attack Damage. Any physical damage dealt Sunder the target for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor by 50%

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Shield the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row for 300/350/400★ damage for 15 seconds.

[Aura item]

craf.name: LordsEdge

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 10 bonus Ability Power.

Combat start: Grant 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 15 bonus Ability Power. Magic or true damage from an Ability 10% Burns and 33% Wounds enemies for the 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 30% bonus Attack Speed.

Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 18 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs:

Attacks cannot miss.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs:
Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

[Aura item]

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 20% bonus Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 50% Attack Damage as physical damage.

[Direct damage item]

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs:

Combat start: Shoots a beam that increases the maximum Mana of affected enemies by 35% until they cast.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: Grant 15 bonus Ability Power. Every 3rd attacks restore 20 additional Mana.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs:
Grant 15 bonus Ability Power. Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 30 magic damage and Shredding them for 5 seconds.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist by 50%%

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 10% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 33% for the duration.

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:

craf.name: WarmogsArmor

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 20% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs:

Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]

radi.name: FimbulwinterRadiant
radi.add_attrs:
Grant 30 bonus starting Mana.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 50% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 10 seconds and 70 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

​​[Aura item]

radi.name: RadientArchangelsStaff
radi.add_attrs: Now grants the wearer 30 ability power every 4 seconds.

radi.name: RadientBloodthirster
radi.add_attrs:
Damage heals the holder for 40% of the damage dealt. Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 40% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +30% Attack Damage

radi.name: RadientBlueBuff
radi.add_attrs:
Grant 10 bonus starting Mana and 50 bouns Ability Power. Abilities cost 20 less Mana to cast.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 10.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radi.name: RadientBrambleVest
radi.add_attrs: Grant 120 Armor. Negates bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 125/175/225★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

radi.name: RadientChaliceofPower
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 45 Ability Power and 10% Omnivamp for the rest of combat.

[Aura item]

radi.name: RadientDeathblade
radi.add_attrs: Grant 40/70/100★ bonus Attack Damage.

radi.name: RadientDragonsClaw
radi.add_attrs: Grants 180 bonus Magic Resist (including components). Every 1.5 seconds, regenerate 8% maximum Health for each enemy targeting the holder.

radi.name: RadientEdgeofNight
radi.add_attrs: When the holder first drops below 60% Health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains 40% bonus Attack Speed. Triggers again at 30% Health.

radi.name: RadientGargoyleStoneplate
radi.add_attrs:
The holder gains 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 2% max Health per second

radi.name: RadientGiantSlayer
radi.add_attrs: Grant 40% bonus Attack Damage and 40 bonus Ability Power. If the target has more than 1600 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 70%.

radi.add_attrs:
Attacks grant +10% bonus Attack Speed.This effect stacks

Radiant Bonus: +15% Attack Speed

radi.name: RadientHandofJustice
radi.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder gains both of the following:
+50 Attack Damage and +50 Ability Power.
Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.

radi.name: RadientHextechGunblade
radi.add_attrs:
The holder's damage heal them for 35% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

Radiant Bonus: +30 Ability Power

radi.name: RadientInfinityEdge
radi.add_attrs:
Unique Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components) and 10% Critical Strike Damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

Radiant Bonus: +55% Critical Strike Damage

radi.name: RadientIonicSpark
radi.add_attrs:
Enemies within 3 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped, taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

radi.name: RadientJeweledGauntlet
radi.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains 40% bonus Critical Strike Damage and 50 Ability Power.

radi.name: RadientLastWhisper
radi.add_attrs:
Gain a 35% Attack Damage. When the holder deals physical damage, the target's Armor is reduced by 50% for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

Radiant Bonus: +35% Critical Strike Chance

radi.name: RadientLocketoftheIronSolari
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 3 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 400/500/600★ damage for 60 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: Grants 125 Health for all allies at the start of combat.

radi.name: RadientMorellonomicon
radi.add_attrs: Grants 70 bonus Ability Power (including components). When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 60% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 30 seconds. and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

radi.name: RadientQuicksilver
radi.add_attrs:
The holder gains immunity to crowd control in combat for 30 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +60% Attack Speed

radi.name: RadientRabadonsDeathcap
radi.add_attrs: Grants 105 bonus Ability Power (including components).

radi.name: RadientRapidFirecannon
radi.add_attrs: Increases the holder's Attack Range by 2 hexes and grants 99% bonus Attack Speed (including components). The wearer's attacks can no longer miss.

radi.name: RadientRedemption
radi.add_attrs:
Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 2 hexes, healing them for 25% of their missing Health. Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for 5 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +150 Health

radi.name: RadientRunaansHurricane
radi.add_attrs:
Grant 20% Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage as physical damage.

Also, gain 20% Attack Speed.

radi.name: RadientShroudofStillness
radi.add_attrs:
Health 250. When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 50% until they cast.

Radiant Bonus: +15 Mana for all allies at the start of combat

radi.name: RadientSpearofShojin
radi.add_attrs:
The holder's attacks restore 40 additional Mana.

Radiant Passive: +50 Ability Power.

radi.name: RadientStatikkShiv
radi.add_attrs: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 8 enemies, dealing 100 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

radi.name: RadientSunfireCape
radi.add_attrs:
Grants 200 bonus Health (including components). Every 1.5 seconds, a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 60% of their maximum Health as true damage over 30 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radi.name: RadientThiefsGloves
radi.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

radi.name: RadientTitansResolve
radi.add_attrs: When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain 3% Attack Damage and Ability Power. This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

radi.name: RadientWarmogsArmor
radi.add_attrs:
Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second

radi.name: RadientZekesHerald
radi.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 10% hexes in the same row gain 50% Attack Speed and 10% Lifesteal for the rest of combat.

radi.name: RadientZephyr
radi.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

Radiant Bonus: +20% Attack Speed for all allies at the start of combat

radi.name: RadientZzRotPortal
radi.add_attrs: At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 4 hexes. When the holder dies, a Radiant Voidmother with bonus stats arises taunting nearby enemies. Radiant Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

radi.name: RadientStridebreaker
radi.add_attrs: Grant 40% bonus Attack Damage and 40 bonus Ability Power. After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks 70% deal more damage for a few seconds.

arti.name: OrnnItemBlackCleaver
arti.add_attrs:
The wearer's basic attacks and spell damage shred enemy armor and magic resistance by 50% for 4 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemDeathsDance
arti.add_attrs:
50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage. The holder's Attacks and Abilities also heal for 25% of damage dealt.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemEverfrost
arti.add_attrs:
Enemies who damage the holder have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 1.5 seconds. After being slowed this way 7 times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every 15 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemMuramana
arti.add_attrs:
After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore 120 mana over 5 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemRanduinsOmen
arti.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain 50 bonus armor and 50 bonus magic resistance for the rest of combat.

[Aura item]

arti.name: OrnnItemRocketPropelledFist
arti.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, the wearer Airborne pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, Stun stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy. (Always targets a different unit than Blitzcrank)

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemSpiritVisage
arti.add_attrs: The wearer regenerates 2.5% of their maximum health each second.

arti.name: OrnnItemTheCollector
arti.add_attrs:
The wearer executes enemies below 12% health on-hit. Executions generate 1 gold 40% of the time.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTrinityForce
arti.add_attrs: Attack Damage +25%, Attack Speed +25%, Ability Power +25, Armor +25, Magic Resist +25, Health +25, Mana +25
